required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: Edoxaban will be similar to dalteparin in preventing recurrence of acute VTE following an initial index event in cancer subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: incidence of recurrent VTE at end of study
primary_outcome.description: primary efficacy outcome is incidence of recurrent VTE at end of study

primary_outcome.measure: incidence of of clinically relevant bleeding while on treatment
primary_outcome.description: primary safety outcome is incidence of clinically relevant bleeding while on treatment
